basics.name: Gabriel Favot
basics.label: Senior Fullstack Engineer
basics.summary: Fullstack Engineer with over 6 years of experience building scalable products in fast-growing startups.

work.name: Air France
work.summary: Frontend development on an internal operational tool using Angular and TypeScript.
highlights: Developed and maintained an internal web application for operational teams
Built reusable UI components and integrated REST APIs
Worked in a small agile team with direct stakeholder interaction

work.name: Manager.one
work.summary: Core contributor to a professional online banking platform and white-label ecosystem.
highlights: Contributed to the development of a large-scale B2B professional banking solution.
Held full ownership of 2 white-label projects: managed direct client relationships (from requirements gathering to feedback), technical implementation, and final delivery.
Led a team of 3 developers, conducting code reviews and mentoring on best practices.

work.name: Beamy
work.summary: Fullstack engineer on a SaaS management platform using a modern TypeScript stack.
highlights: Built and maintained scalable backend services with NestJS (TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Redis) and modern frontend features using Nuxt 3.
Developed a high-performance web extension distributed to 100,000+ users, with strong constraints on data retrieval efficiency.
Implemented Hexagonal Architecture principles across several projects to improve code decoupling and testability.
Drove the adoption of AI-assisted development tools within the team, from early GitHub Copilot integration to migrating to Cursor.
Maintained CI/CD pipelines and deployed new services on GCP and Kubernetes clusters.

projects.name: Sound Kiffeur
projects.description: A personal project developed to visualize Spotify listening history and real-time playback through a dynamic and immersive interface.
highlights: Built with Nuxt 3 and integrated Spotify Web API to fetch and process real-time user playback and historical data.
Experimented with modern frontend techniques to ensure smooth, high-performance visual rendering.

projects.name: Apartment Full Renovation
projects.description: End-to-end renovation of a residential property.
highlights: Planned and executed a complete renovation, including bathroom remodeling and electrical system upgrades.
Learned to manage budgets, timelines, and handle unexpected issues along the way.
Demonstrated strong hands-on 'maker' skills and attention to detail.

projects.name: Personal Home Server & Homelab
projects.description: Self-hosted infrastructure managing home automation and private cloud services.
highlights: Architected a home server hosting multiple open-source services and custom micro-apps using Docker.
Developed a custom Instagram scraping tool to automatically extract and centralize cooking recipes.
Implemented home automation systems to monitor and control domestic infrastructure.
